description: Gabriel's Horn paradox. Title 'Infinite Surface Finite Volume?' centered at top. Use Text() ONLY - absolutely NO MathTex or Tex. Step 1: Show equation y = 1/x using VGroup fraction (Text 1 on top, Line, Text x on bottom) - position this in CENTER of screen. Step 2: Draw the 1/x curve from x=1 extending right, keep it CENTERED horizontally. Step 3: Show horn shape below the curve. Step 4: Show Volume = π in GREEN centered. Step 5: Surface = ∞ in RED centered below Volume. Step 6: 'Fill inside? YES' and 'Paint surface? NO' paradox text centered. Final: 'Gabriel's Horn' title BLUE centered, 'V = π, S = ∞' YELLOW centered below. ALL text should be horizontally CENTERED (x=0).
title: Geometry Dash: Rhythm & Reflexes
